Description.Text: The River Hotel is located in the center of downtown Chicago, overlooking the famous Chicago River, Tribune Tower and Wrigley Building. Just one block north is the Magnificent Mile, famous for shopping. The hotel is also a short walk to Chicago's Theater District, the Chicago Cultural Center, Millennium Park, Navy Pier and Marina City. The Chicago River Hotel features free high-speed Internet access, 24-hour concierge, a comfortable lounge with complimentary computers/printer, a fitness room and the popular Bella Bacino's, a casual Italian American trattoria famous for its pizza. Valet parking is available for a daily fee of $35. Self parking is $22 daily. Guestrooms include custom designed furnishings and premium bedding, flat panel LCD TV's and the latest design in work stations with ergonomic chairs and task lighting. Corporate Apartments are available for extended stays. We invite you stay with us and experience the hospitality of the Chicago River Hotel.

The River Hotel is located in the center of downtown Chicago, overlooking the famous Chicago River, Tribune Tower and Wrigley Building. Just one block north is the Magnificent Mile, famous for shopping. The hotel is also a short walk to Chicago's Theater District, the Chicago Cultural Center, Millennium Park, Navy Pier and Marina City.

Two Room Suite - For the ultimate in thoughtful design, our deluxe two room suite is our most spacious room type and provides a queen sized bed in each bedroom, two bathrooms, and a kitchenette
SINGLE/SMALL DOUBLE ROOM - One double bed with premium bedding and linens. Contemporary wood furnishings. Desk and ergonomic chair. Flat panel LCD TV's. Complimentary high-speed Internet access. Two phones; speakerphones and cordless. Coffee/tea maker. Walk-in shower. Maximum Occupancy:2
STANDARD - ROOM - One queen bed or two twin beds with luxury bedding and linens. Contemporary wood furnishings. Desk and ergonomic chair. Flat panel LCD Television. Complimentary high-speed Internet access. Lounge chair. Two phones; speakerphone and cordless. Coffee/tea maker. Walk-in shower.
SUPERIOR - One queen bed and sofabed with luxury bedding and linens. Contemporary wood furnishings. Desk with ergonomic chair. Flat panel LCD television. Multi-line speakerphone (cordless) with voice mail. Complimentary high-speed Internet access. Cable/satellite TV with pay movies. Kitchenette with compact refrigerator and microwave. Adjustable showerheads and makeup/shaving mirror.
ONE ROOM SUITE WITH KITCHENETTE - One queen bed and one sofa bed with luxury bedding and linens. Contemporary wood furnishings. Desk with ergonomic chair. Flat panel LCD television. Multi-line speakerphone (cordless) with voice mail. Complimentary wireless Internet access. Cable/satellite TV with On Demand movies. Kitchenette with compact refrigerator and microwave. Adjustable showerheads and makeup/shaving mirror.
